襗襗襗

襗字的基本解释

襗
zé
贴身的衣服：“香衫画襗有情时，回颦向闺里。”
套裤。

襗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zé］
［《廣韻》場伯切，入陌，澄。］
［《廣韻》徒落切，入鐸，定。］
亵衣，贴身的衣裤。

襗字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襗； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1125第18
【唐韻】徒落切【集韻】達各切，?音鐸。【說文】絝也。　又【韻會】直袼切，音宅。義同。【詩·秦風】與子同襗。【箋】襗，褻衣近污垢。　又【廣韻】羊益切，音奕。【博雅】長襦也。【周禮·春官註】巾絮寢衣袍襗之屬。

襗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
襗字的起名意思

暂无。

Ridicule
Basic explanation of words
Ridicule
zé
Close-fitting clothes: "When the fragrant sweater is sentimental, go back to your boudoir."
Trousers.
Ridicule
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zé］
["Guangyun" Chang Bo cuts, enters the street, and is clear. ]
["Guangyun" only falls into the cut, enters the priest, and settles. ]
Obscene clothes, close-fitting underwear.
Ridicule
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襗; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1125 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Tu Luoqie [Jiyun] Da Geqie,? Yin Duo. [Said the text] Dan Ye.　[Rhyme Club] Straight cut, sound house. The same meaning. 【Poetry·Qin Feng】Same as the son. [Jan] 襗, the clothes are close to dirt.　[Guang Yun] Sheep Yi cuts, Yin Yi. [Bo Ya] Long Ning also. [Zhou Li·Chunguan Note] A genus of towels, bedclothes and gowns.
